caption:
This photograph captures an elderly man sitting and smiling broadly at the camera. He is wearing a light-colored cap and a grey jacket over a dark collar shirt. The man has a joyful and engaging expression, featuring prominent laugh lines and a warm smile.

The setting appears to be a cluttered workshop or storage room. In the background, there are various items strewn around which indicate the space is used for either mechanical work or storage. Visible items include boxes, possibly containing parts or tools, and what looks like the edge of an orange vehicle or machinery. The lighting is dim yet highlights the manâ€™s face, creating a cozy and candid ambiance. The surroundings suggest the man might be involved in repair work or similar hands-on activities.
title: Retired citizen in gas station in rural utica.  His sons own the station, his wife pumps the gas
